content: कच्छः --छं {@--1@} Bank, margin, skirt, bordering region (whether near water or not); यमुनाकच्छमवतीर्णः <ls>Pt. 1</ls>; गंधमादनकच्छोऽध्यासितः <ls>V. 5</ls>; <ls>Śi. 3. 80</ls>; <ls>Māl. 9. 16.</ls> {@--2@} A marsh, morass, fen. {@--3@} The hem of the lower garment tucked into the waistband; see कक्षा. {@--4@} A part of a boat. {@--5@} A particular part of a tortoise (in कच्छप). {@--6@} A tree, the timber of which is used for making furniture (तुन्न). --च्छा {@--1@} A cricket. {@--2@} The plant Lycopodium Imbricatum (वाराही).
